# SIR-Cholera Model in Nairobi

This project explores a Susceptible-Infected-Recovered (SIR) model to study cholera transmission dynamics in Nairobi. The model provides insights into the spread and potential control measures for cholera outbreaks.

- **Objective**: To model cholera transmission and assess the impact of public health interventions.
- **Approach**: Used epidemiological modeling techniques and analyzed key parameters in the SIR framework.
